resources.string: Dealer \(switches off\) deals 6 cards to each player. Dealer then cuts deck, and non-dealer flips over top card. \(One point goes to the non-dealer if the card flipped over is a Jack.\) Each player discards two cards from their hand to the \'crib\'.

Non-dealer lays a card face up, followed by dealer and alternating. Ranks of cards are summed. Points are gained by owner of last card played if\: 1\) Total = 15 \(\+2 pts\), 2\) Previous card\(s\) have same rank as placed card (+2 pts per pair), 3\) Any permutation of 3 or more straight cards forms a run (+n pts) The Total is capped at 31. If player has no valid cards, say \"Go\". Opponent must play cards until no valid move. Gains 2 pts for total \= 31, 1 pt otherwise. Sum resets, play continues with next player\'s card until no cards remain.

Each player recollects their cards into their hand. Non-dealer tallies up points within hand and flipped card\: \+2 pts for any combination of cards totaling 15 \+2 pts for any pair \(thus +6 pts for triple and +12 pts for quadruple\) \+n pts for a run of n \(must be 3 or more\) \+1 pt if hand contains jack of the same suit as flipped card Process repeats with dealer\'s hand, then with \"crib\" \(points go to dealer\)
